Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-1642 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.28.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-1642 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.28.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nginx is earlier than 1.28.2-1, affected by CVE-2026-1642
